name: jobify
description: ### App will handle login/registration, ### Creating, Deleting, Editing, and Listing Jobs ### Analytics

scripts.build: cd jobify-fe && npm run build && cd ../jobify-be && npm run build
scripts.setup-project: cd jobify-be && npm ci && cd ../jobify-fe && npm ci
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail " npm run server " " npm run client "
